name: Ravesta: Matts Project Zombies
description:
M.A.T.T.S Project Z is an intense solo or online co-operative shooter with Huge Worlds to explore, take down large groups of zombies, bandits, and other monsters. Fight fast-paced gruesome action against the Dead. Customize, Build Traps, and modify weapons for gory combat, Reclaim Planet Earth!

What About Sound?

Don't worry, We come from a background of Mastering Audio Production since 2000. Find us at Ravesta Records and our Credits to our Artists in the game for Their music and other work in the game. OnDaMiKe, DJ Fixx, Face & Book, DJ Magic Mike, Pingüino, DJ EKL. Atmospheres, SFX, Weapons & More produced at top Quality for the immerse rive enviroments you been looking for :) some amazing work from our artists goes to the Night Club map, all our music Ravesta Records family is in house produced for the game! Check out the Music in our game Enjoy!

A Game That’s Always Growing

Community Feedback allows us to work of your comments. questions and concerns about our game, we look at this Daily and make changes accordingly. We always update our content for Free and do not charge for addition content like DLCS.


You and or your crew are ravaging a post-apocalyptic wasteland through different various parts world in levels.

Become The Best Player

Learn all the weapon patterns, zombies, ai, your control with all the weapons, traps, knowing all pickups and of course Surviving tons of waves to be #1 On Leaderboards.

Features

  • Full Online Multiplayer With Steam!
  • Chat Online With Other Players!
  • Really smooth working settings, Audio selections for every type, and every graphic setting for optimal performance.
  • Recoil System created for each weapon in the game (increases/decreases in size based on spread of weapon while moving, aiming, etc)
  • Points System (used as the currency in-game to spend on opening doors, buying weapons, traps, etc)
  • Random Weapon Box
  • Traps
  • Power-Up Drops
  • Open-World and over 30 maps to play that all seamlessly load together.
  • All zombies and ai will gradually become harder and increasingly faster as you progress in the game so it never gets dull.
  • Great Sound Selection! Music Produced by in house exclusive professionals. Copyright Royalty Free by Ravesta Records
  • & Much More!
